name: Kyle's Wings
description:
KYLE'S WINGS is a Crazy Taxi meets the sky islands of BioShock Infinite game where you taxi people around with the wings of an angel. Fly around this angelic heavenly world as you pick up customers and fly them around the islands as fast as you can!

On the sky islands, Kyle needs a job. As Kyle is the only one with wings an idea pops up in his head! He can make he's own airborne taxi service!
Taxi people around in this arcade style game. Fly through wings to gain more speed, time and fare money as you take your customer to their destination.

Navigate through the 4 different islands such as the wind island where you will have to fight against the wind as you fly.

Enjoy the atmospheric environment in this single player game as you gracefully navigate through the islands.
